sentences.english: The hydroxide polysiloxane is one of the important products of the organic silicon industry.
sentences.chinese: 羟基聚硅氧烷是有机硅工业的重要产品之一。

sentences.english: Both the free hydroxyl groups readily undergo esterification .
sentences.chinese: 两个自由羟基，都容易酯化。

sentences.english: It is revealed that hydroxyl content was also the key factor to q m of porous PS microspheres.
sentences.chinese: 羟基含量也是影响聚蔗糖多孔微球吸附量的主导因素。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hydroxyapatite artificial eye base is one kind of comparatively ideal material for eye socket implantation.
sentences.chinese: 结论羟基磷灰石义眼座是眼窝填充术的较理想材料。

sentences.english: Relationship between photocatalytic degradation of benzoic acids and reaction with hydroxyl radical.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲酸类光催化降解和羟基自由基反应的关系。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the effect of hydroxy camptothecin on colorectal carcinoma cells in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨羟基喜树碱对肠癌细胞的体外作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the preparation of estrogen 3-methyl ether.
sentences.chinese: 目的改进雌激素类化合物3位酚羟基的甲醚化工艺。

sentences.english: The hydroxycitronellal has been synthesized from citronella oil .
sentences.chinese: 从香茅油出发合成了羟基香茅醛。

sentences.english: Protocatechuic acid , 4-hydmxyphenyl-lactic acid are separated from the plant for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 原儿茶酸，羟基苯乳酸首次从该种植物中分离得到。

sentences.english: Dihydroxyglyoxime (DHG) particles were coated in emulsion solutions of polyvinyl acetate.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乳液聚合聚醋酸乙烯酯对二羟基乙二肟的包覆。

sentences.english: The treatment with 8% glycolic acid remained during the chemical peeling period.
sentences.chinese: 两次化学脱皮期间仍外用8%羟基乙酸。

sentences.english: The hydroxyl radicals could be trapped by PBN in aqueous solution.
sentences.chinese: 在水溶剂中用PBN自旋捕捉到了羟基自由基。

sentences.english: FREE of Dyes, Perfume, Lanolin, Parabens and Formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 不含染料，香水，羊毛脂，对羟基苯甲酸酯和甲醛。

sentences.english: The content ofp hydroxybenzoic acid in sawdust is the highest, followed by that ofp coumaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 木屑中对羟基苯甲酸含量最高，香豆酸次之。

sentences.english: The results show that the obtained flower-like crystals are carbonated hydroxyapatite.
sentences.chinese: 测试结果表明得到的花状结晶为碳酸羟基磷灰石。

sentences.english: Conclusions The hydroxyapatite complex is the ideal filling material.
sentences.chinese: 结论羟基磷灰石复合体是较为理想的充填材料。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
